Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 29 minutes ago, Kerdel said:
> 
> 
> how do i fix Val's Home issue
> 

Go into settings and make veterans unaffected by Life support. should turn her back into a pilot.

> 
> 
> 27 minutes ago, Caerfinon said:
> 
> 
> Go into settings and make veterans unaffected by Life support. should turn her back into a pilot.
> 

Oke, I meant any kerbal if their "home" is red

> 
> 
> 41 minutes ago, Kerdel said:
> 
> 
> I meant any kerbal if their "home" is red
> 

Home time can be increased if there is more living space per kerbal to make them less homesick.   

It can also be reduced if the base has a colonization module or a med bay.

The MKS wiki -> [https://github.com/UmbraSpaceIndustries/MKS/wiki/Functions-(Med-Bay-and-Colony-Supplies)](https://github.com/UmbraSpaceIndustries/MKS/wiki/Functions-%28Med-Bay-and-Colony-Supplies%29)  

and -> [https://github.com/UmbraSpaceIndustries/MKS/wiki/Functions-(Habitation)#habitation-and-homesickness](https://github.com/UmbraSpaceIndustries/MKS/wiki/Functions-%28Habitation%29#habitation-and-homesickness)

> 
> 
> 24 minutes ago, Caerfinon said:
> 
> 
> Home time can be increased if there is more living space per kerbal to make them less homesick.   
> 
> It can also be reduced if the base has a colonization module or a med bay.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> The MKS wiki -> [https://github.com/UmbraSpaceIndustries/MKS/wiki/Functions-(Med-Bay-and-Colony-Supplies)](https://github.com/UmbraSpaceIndustries/MKS/wiki/Functions-%28Med-Bay-and-Colony-Supplies%29)  
> 
> and -> [https://github.com/UmbraSpaceIndustries/MKS/wiki/Functions-(Habitation)#habitation-and-homesickness](https://github.com/UmbraSpaceIndustries/MKS/wiki/Functions-%28Habitation%29#habitation-and-homesickness)
> 

Thank you, so I made the ship to small or no extra modules added. Now I really can't transfer Val without attaching a grabbing unit aha i get it

this means i should never let a kerbal "home" go into red but the other 3 supply/Ec/Hab can be fixed if i'm right

i'll look into the links you send me thanks [@Caerfinon](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/207619-caerfinon/) and [@RoverDude](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/105198-roverdude/) for the help! Nice mod by the way!

[@RoverDude](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/105198-roverdude/) Takes pull requests.  If you feel you could write a proper description I'm sure he would pull it in.  In fact if you wanted to take a crack at an updated <abbr title="1. Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it. 2. Overpowered. A part or mechanic that upsets game balance by being too powerful.">OP</abbr> he would appreciate the help.

Given how busy the man is, and how many complex mods he works on, I would venture to guess that most people would prefer that he spends his time working on completing the cool features he has been adding vs forum posts.

As for the <abbr title="1. Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it. 2. Overpowered. A part or mechanic that upsets game balance by being too powerful.">OP</abbr>, I'd just add that the mod includes optional recyclers and greenhouses instead of the sentence "No extra recyclers needed.", link the wiki page [https://github.com/UmbraSpaceIndustries/<abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr>-LS/wiki](https://github.com/UmbraSpaceIndustries/USI-LS/wiki) and call it a day.

I'm having an issue with this mod. I can't open the Life Support screen in the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building"><abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr></abbr>. When I'm in space or in the Space Center view the screen is blank. And last but definitely not least the log is getting spammed with "Object reference not set to an instance of an object IN ModuleLifeSupport" I could really use some help getting this mod to work. Ive searched this forum but haven't found a solution. Thanks.

> 
> 
> 17 minutes ago, JB5 said:
> 
> 
> I'm having an issue with this mod. I can't open the Life Support screen in the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building"><abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr></abbr>. When I'm in space or in the Space Center view the screen is blank. And last but definitely not least the log is getting spammed with "Object reference not set to an instance of an object IN ModuleLifeSupport" I could really use some help getting this mod to work. Ive searched this forum but haven't found a solution. Thanks.
> 

Always start with KSP version and <abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr>-LS version.  A screenshot of your GameData folder would not hurt either.

>

Clean save with just LS worked fine. I'm going to do a one-by-one addition of all mods till it stops working. Ill report back what I find.

Thanks!  I know it's a pain, but it helps us see if there's a conflict somewhere, and it's appreciated.  If everything still works, then it's something in the save and we can try clearing out all of the <abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr>-LS persistence data and see if that fixes it.

Ok. It's confirmed, and I feel like a bit of a dummy. Progressive Colonization System conflicts with <abbr title="Umbra Space Industries (a collection of mods)">USI</abbr> LS. It even says so on its main forum page naming LS by name. Once that was removed it worked just fine. Derp!
